TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LoadedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface.Loaded"> event. This class cannot be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool succeeded, class System.Collections.ICollection errors) cil managed

Docs.param: `true` to indicate that the designer load was successful; otherwise, `false`.
A collection of errors that occurred while the designer was loading.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.LoadedEventArgs"> class.
Gets a collection of errors that occurred while the designer was loading.
Docs.value: A collection of errors that occurred while the designer was loading.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the designer load was successful.
Docs.value: `true` if the designer load was successful; otherwise, `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Even successful loads can have errors if the errors were not too severe to prevent the designer from loading.
